Met you due to the greastest "beggar" in BK - m4w (L train )

Bogart Street at Harrison Place

(google map) (yahoo map)

hair : Blonde : Beanie with bear ears

I forgot what stop he got on at, but we listened to this guy give a great speech for food and/or money. He asked me if I knew who you were, I said no, but I really wanted to get to know you. You had a furry bear beanie on with blonde hair poking through. You eventually got off at the Morgan stop, unfortunately I was riding wih a friend I volunteer with and would have felt like a dick if I ditched her to chase you.

Well this whole missed connection thing feels creepy, but I mean it in the least creepiest way. I was the guy sitting across from you, with an odd looking beard, & maroon pants. I'd really like to have dinner with you if you're interested.
